comments.name: Salman Naqvi

comments.html: I'll definitely second post. I've recommended ipSpace blog articles and subscriptions to numerous fellow contractors - with great results too. I definitely give ipSpace subscription part credit for my last promotion.
comments.name: Salman Naqvi

comments.html: Same here, I recommend IPspace to my clients as well.
comments.name: jsicuran

comments.html: I've convinced my manager to reimburse me for the yearly subscription cost. What I really like about your content, Ivan, is that you present your information with a "thinking outside the box" approach. The content you provide also illustrates technical break-downs and sometimes challenges vendor solutions - bypassing the marketing/sales cycle hype. I always look forward to reading/listening to your blogs and webinars - other computer based training materials don't really provide this level of vendor neutral material based on years of networking experiences from the trenches.
comments.name: Mario
